replies.body:
Another Jinx skin, another Ziggs skin, a LEGENDARY skin for a recently made champion, Kayn??

Poor Kled, poor Trundle, poor handful of champions that haven't got over one 1350rp+ skin or any skin in the recent couple of years. Those of which, deserve new skins so frequently instead, like Rumble, NOT Caitlyn.

(Badlands Baron Rumble ring a bell?)
Rito are a company that likes to make money as like any other company, they're legit only gonna release skins that'll actually sell

That's what I'm saying. Rumble is an old champion. He has two very old skins, a legendary skin that's a few years old and an epic skin. And before he got that new skin he only had three. Oh, and there's Yorick.. Veigar got a skin after a few years also. Surely he's not that unpopular..
But I suppose you're right. Better profits will provide better skins and better everything for the game. Almost everything..

Surprised to see Nexus Blitz go so soon, my friends and I were just getting the hang of it.
Hopefully it'll be back soon.
